description:
"I want to be a mechanical engineer for a car company," Tommy told us. "Design engines and cars, probably. That's what I'm going to school for."
Tommy LOVES cars!
His father was a mechanic, and he grew up around cars.
"My father taught me everything I know," he said. "I love to just get in and bust my knuckles!"
He also loves skateboarding, and he especially loves it during the summer when he can wear next to nothing!
"I live in Texas," he said. "It gets really, really hot. All the guys are out without shirts. And you can pretty much see everything through their shorts!"
Interesting! It must be pretty fun to watch, because Tommy has a hot chest, tight abs, a pretty big cock!
title: Tommy
